page.title: 06WATERSPORTS - WALES VILLAGE
page.content: {ROTHER VALLEY COUNTRY PARK}provides excellent watersports facilities at very cheap prices.There is sailing, windsurfing, rowing, canoeing and water ski-ing. Personal boats and equipment can be used or they can be hired from the park. Hire charges are very cheap, eg: Sailing dinghies & Surfboards = Â£1.40 Canoes = Â£1.20 per 90 minute session. Children, pensioners, disabled and unemployed people pay half the price. Instructors are available and there is always safety cover on the water. It is a rule that everyone wears a life-jacket. There is a wide variety of craft for hire, including Toppers, Lasers, various types of windsurf boards and even special boats for disabled people.It is a lovely park.
